docs.lead_paragraph: A feathered stowaway was brought ashore yesterday from the Italian liner Saturnia and quartered in the pier telephone operator's office while officials of the American Export Lines looked through Public Health Office manuals for advice on its disposal.

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 14 -- The United States Olympic team won the 1948 games by a margin of 309 points. The Americans, second to Germany in the 1936 Olympics, compiled 662 points in the games that ended in London tonight with Sweden a distant second with 353...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 14 -- The United States Olympic team won the 1948 games by a margin of 309 points. The Americans, second to Germany in the 1936 Olympics, compiled 662 points in the games that ended in London tonight with Sweden a distant second with 353 tallies.

headline.main: Final Team Points For London Games

docs.snippet: Last week's foreign exchange market was a dull affair. This restriction of business and fluctuations was due to the "summer doldrums" and an easing of the tension which prevailed in the market prior to the opening operations of ERP.

docs.snippet: ASUNCION, Paraguay, Aug. 15 -- Today, on the 411th anniversary of the founding of this landlocked city that is now her capital, Paraguay inaugurated Juan Natalicio Gonzalez for a five-year term as President.

docs.snippet: The Moore-McCormack Lines announced yesterday the appointment of Capt. John M. Hultman of 167 Lenox Road, Brooklyn, as staff captain of the liner Uruguay. With the Argentina and Brazil, this vessel completes the line's Good Neighbor passenger fleet...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Moore-McCormack Lines announced yesterday the appointment of Capt. John M. Hultman of 167 Lenox Road, Brooklyn, as staff captain of the liner Uruguay. With the Argentina and Brazil, this vessel completes the line's Good Neighbor passenger fleet operating between New York and ports on the east coast of South America.

docs.lead_paragraph: Advertising in eight major New York newspapers during the first seven months of this year totaled 83,332,259 lines, a gain of 4.94 perh)0*0*0*icent over the similar period of last year, according to an analysis of Media Records figures. Categories showing gains were automotive, 27.31 per cent; retail, 7.74 per cent, and classified, 0.50 per cent.

docs.snippet: Exporters of apples, pears and grapes to South America are asking State Department action to bring about lifting of the "embargo" against these fruits in Brazil, Argentina and Uruguay, it was learned here yesterday.
